anathema: Break the laws of hospitality, allow a guest to bring harm to your family
edict: Preserve elven art and architecture, bless and secure households, inspire and aid others with your works
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Findeladlara (The Guiding Hand)](/Deities.aspx?ID=461)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 308

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Elven Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=9)

**Edicts** Preserve elven art and architecture, bless and secure households, inspire and aid others with your works

**Anathema** Break the laws of hospitality, allow a guest to bring harm to your family

**Area of Concern**
Architecture, art, twilight

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Charisma or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37)

**Favored Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=367)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=66), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Star](/Domains.aspx?ID=119)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Temporary Tool](/Spells.aspx?ID=2369)

- **4th**
[Shape Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=1667)

- **7th**
[Planar Palace](/Spells.aspx?ID=1634)

</column>
name: Findeladlara (The Guiding Hand)
